name: 2DP's Big Adventure
description:
While 2DP-22 (our tiny hero) was on his well-deserved charging break, something terrible happened...

Some kind of energy pulse hit the city, throwing 2DP-22 out of the window to the streets and causing all other robots to malfunction.

2DP-22 must get to the bottom of this and find out what kind of evil is afoot.

DESCRIPTION:

2DP's Big Adventure is a platformer where you help a tiny robot to complete his quest. The game is a student project and contains one level & one boss fight.

HOW TO PLAY:

Use ARROW KEYS to move, SPACE to jump and LEFT ALT/LEFT CTRL to use your weapons. ESC for menu.
